frontmatter.title: OpenShift Commons Gathering on GitOps
frontmatter.lead_text: This OpenShift Commons Gathering on GitOps will be held on February 9th in Pacific Standard Time (PST)
frontmatter.info_text: This OpenShift Commons Gathering will be held live  and broadcast live around the globe. As always, our focus is on creating a welcoming and inclusive space for peer-to-peer interactions online. This Gathering will focus on talks from and by GitOps practitioners with production deployments sharing their use cases, insights into their workloads and lessons learned along the way.
frontmatter.event_footer_text: All times specified are Pacific Time

schedule.session_name: Welcome to the Commons: Unlock the Potential of Collaboration
The Path to GitOps: How to Started with GitOps
GitOps in Action at University of Michigan
What's Next in GitOps at Red Hat: Argo, Tekton, Operators, Pipelines and more
GitOps AMA Panel: Live Q/A with Guest Speakers & Project Leads
